creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: loose purple tunic with long side vents with orange binding and red sleeves; right front diagonal opening--orange; neck and shoulders have woven tape trim--red and metal thread with insert of black satin; metal bead and yarn closure at neck

44 1/2 x 32 in. (113.03 x 81.28 cm)

title: Woman's tunic
